title: 32: Data Privacy
dc:creator: mad hat pod
description: For this episode we are joined by PhD candidate Joy Wu and Professor Aija Leiponen to discuss data privacy; how it is collected, who possess it, and should we have more power to choose how it’s disclosed.  Hosted by Elaine Qiu, Yudong Rao, and Professor David Just.
